About

A Computer Science Gradute Student at University of Southern California. Previously a System Architect where I worked on large scale distributed sytems, microservices and containers. Undergraduate projects focused on Machine/Deep Learning and Distributed Systems. Currently exploring the domains of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

Publications:

Performance Analysis and Application of Expressiveness Detection on Facial Expression Videos Using Deep Learning Techniques

Analytics on medical records collected from a distributed system deployed in the Indian rural demographic

Analysis of Facial Expressiveness Captured in Reaction to Videos
